errors.apiUnreachable: Drovi API unreachable. Check that the intelligence stack is running.
errors.missingApiKey: Missing API key. Include X-API-Key header.

auth.signInDescription: Enter your credentials to access your workspace.
auth.signUpDescription: Get started with Drovi in minutes.

testimonial.quote: "Drovi transformed how I manage my inbox. I never miss commitments, and the AI summaries save me hours every week. It feels like having a perfect memory for all my email conversations."
testimonial.name: Michael Kim

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.passwordMinChars: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain an uppercase letter
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain a lowercase letter

signUp.acceptTermsError: Please accept the terms and conditions

passwordReset.layoutDescription: Password resets are handled by your workspace admin

forgot.title: Password resets are managed by your admin
forgot.description: For pilot workspaces, administrators handle password resets directly. Reach out to your org admin or support to regain access.

reset.title: Reset links aren't enabled yet
reset.description: Your admin can reset your password or send you a new invite. If you need help, contact support.
reset.helpSuffix: with your workspace name and we'll assist you.

createOrg.title: Set up your organization
createOrg.description: Confirm the workspace details for your team

name.label: Organization Name
name.hint: This is the name that will be displayed to your team

region.label: Primary Region
region.hint: Used for compliance defaults and data residency

createOrg.footerNote: You can always change these settings later in your organization settings

inviteTeam.title: Invite your team

pending.title: Pending invites
pending.roleHint: Click the role badge to toggle between admin and member

inviteTeam.empty: Add email addresses above to invite your team members
inviteTeam.footerNote: You can always invite more team members from your dashboard

toasts.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
toasts.duplicateEmail: This email has already been added
toasts.sendFailed: Failed to send some invitations. Please try again.

welcomeCard.line2: Your workspace is ready to use.

quickStart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickStart.description: Learn the basics and get productive in minutes

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Invite team members and work together seamlessly

aiInsights.title: AI-Powered Insights
aiInsights.description: Let AI help you discover valuable leads faster

description.connected: Keep adding sources to deepen the memory graph and accelerate briefs.
description.connect: Pick the sources that matter most. We will backfill history and keep everything in sync.

needHelp.title: Need help?
needHelp.description: Our support team is here to assist you with the setup process.

settings.pageDescription: Configure your organization and security posture.
settings.orgDefaultLanguageHint: This becomes the default for new members. Members can still override it.

orgProfile.title: Organization profile
orgProfile.description: Control identity, domains, and routing policies for your org.
orgProfile.allowedDomainsHint: Leave empty to allow any domain for invites.

account.title: Account summary
account.description: Your identity and access level inside Drovi.

security.title: Security posture
security.description: Credentials and audit readiness for your org.
security.note: Password resets, MFA, and device policies are available in the enterprise security console.

export.title: Data export
export.description: Export your intelligence graph for compliance or migrations.
export.hint: Exports are processed asynchronously and expire after 24 hours.

support.title: Support
support.description: Report a bug, request help, or ask for onboarding support.
support.diagnosticsNote: Drovi can attach diagnostics (route + recent API errors) to help us resolve issues faster.

header.title: Proof-first documents
header.description: Upload anything. Drovi turns it into searchable, evidence-anchored memory. Click from a commitment to the exact page region.
header.selectOrg: Select an organization to use Smart Drive

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: Browse, search, and ask within a folder prefix. Uploads inherit the current scope.
scope.noDocuments: Upload a document to start organizing your Drive.
scope.noTags: No tags yet. Add tags while uploading or via metadata later.

library.title: Library
library.description: Documents in your org. Processing runs automatically in the background.
library.emptyScoped: No documents in this scope yet. Upload a PDF or widen your folder prefix.

pages.title: Pages
pages.description: Select a page to view. Evidence quotes highlight automatically.
pages.selectDocument: Select a document to browse its pages.
pages.noParsedPages: No parsed pages yet. If the document is processing, this will fill in automatically.

search.title: Search this folder
search.description: Keyword search now, semantic search when embeddings are available. Results are evidence chunks.
search.placeholder: e.g. engagement letter, client approval, indemnification
search.noResults: No results yet. Try a different query or upload more docs.

ask.title: Ask this folder
ask.description: Evidence-first answers only. If there is no proof in the selected folder, Drovi will refuse.
ask.placeholder: e.g. Where did the client approve scope changes?
ask.emptyAnswer: Ask a question to generate an evidence-first answer.

viewer.title: Viewer
viewer.selectPrompt: Select a document page to preview evidence.

gmail.description: Email messages and threads from Gmail

slack.description: Messages and channels from Slack workspaces

teams.description: Chats and channel messages from Teams

googleCalendar.description: Events and meetings from Google Calendar

hubspot.description: Contacts, deals, and engagements from HubSpot CRM

sources.subtitle: Manage data sources for your intelligence platform

authRequired.title: Not authenticated
authRequired.description: Please log in to manage your data sources

connectDialog.title: Connect a Source
connectDialog.description: Choose a data source to connect to your intelligence platform

backfillDialog.title: Backfill history
backfillDialog.descriptionSuffix: Drovi will window the backfill to respect rate limits.
backfillDialog.note: Backfills run sequentially. You can keep working while ingestion completes in the background.

disconnectDialog.title: Disconnect Source
disconnectDialog.description: Are you sure you want to disconnect {{source}}? This will stop syncing data from this source. Existing data will be preserved.

all.title: No sources connected
all.description: Connect your email, Slack, calendar, and other sources to build your unified intelligence platform

email.title: No email connected
email.description: Connect an email source to get started

messaging.title: No messaging connected
messaging.description: Connect a messaging source to get started

calendar.title: No calendar connected
calendar.description: Connect a calendar source to get started

knowledge.title: No knowledge base connected
knowledge.description: Connect a knowledge base source to get started

crm.title: No CRM connected
crm.description: Connect a CRM source to get started

exchange.title: Install proven intelligence playbooks
exchange.description: Discover curated Agents, publish your own playbooks, and keep governance tight.
exchange.selectOrg: Select an organization to browse the Agent Catalog

filters.title: Discovery Filters
filters.description: Narrow the marketplace to the bundles you want now.

empty.title: No bundles yet
empty.description: Publish your first bundle to bootstrap the Agent Catalog.

curated.title: Curated picks
curated.description: Reviewed by Drovi governance for immediate adoption.

publishDialog.title: Publish Agent Bundle
publishDialog.description: Upload a manifest. Governance review is required before public listing.

team.subtitle: Manage your organization and team members

noOrg.title: No organization selected
noOrg.description: Create or select an organization to manage your team

membersPage.notSignedIn: Sign in to manage your team.
membersPage.subtitle: Manage members in {{org}}
membersPage.empty: No members found. Invite team members to get started.

invitationsPage.notSignedIn: Sign in to invite team members.
invitationsPage.subtitle: Invite new members to {{org}}

form.title: Invite a member
form.description: Send an invitation email to add someone to your team
form.adminRequired: Admin access is required to invite members.

pending.title: Pending invitations
pending.description: Invitations that haven't been accepted yet

settingsPage.title: Team settings
settingsPage.subtitle: Organization identity and policy controls live in Settings.

profile.title: Organization profile
profile.description: Manage identity, domains, and routing policies.
profile.hint: Use the main Settings page to update domains, notification emails, or data region.

policies.title: Org policies
policies.description: Control which sources can be connected and the default visibility for new connections.
policies.adminRequired: Admin access is required to edit org policies. You can still view the current policy state below.

shared.title: Shared
shared.description: Visible to the org by default

private.title: Private
private.description: Only visible to the connector owner

allowedConnectors.title: Allowed connectors
allowedConnectors.hint: When disabled, only selected connectors can be added. Existing connections remain unaffected.

realityStream.selectOrg: Select an organization to view the Reality Stream
realityStream.title: Every signal, every shift, in one timeline
realityStream.description: Track what changed across commitments, decisions, tasks, and signals without losing the context that matters.

filters.title: Stream filters
filters.description: Tune the stream by entity type and time range.

timeline.title: Change timeline
timeline.empty: No changes yet in this window.

noOrg.title: No organization selected
noOrg.description: Select an organization from the sidebar to view the Console.

empty.title: No results found
empty.description: Try adjusting your filters or search terms.

console.emptyChart: Select a "Group by" option to view chart data

notFound.title: Not Found
notFound.description: This unified object doesn't exist or you don't have access to it.

discussion.placeholder: Collaborative threads are coming soon. Capture decisions in the notes section or attach evidence from sources.

tasks.noOrg: Select an organization to view tasks

empty.title: No tasks found
empty.description: Tasks are automatically created from conversations, commitments, and decisions.

toasts.starHint: Use priority levels to highlight important tasks

detail.confirmDelete: Delete this task? This can't be undone.

teamDiscussion.placeholder: Team discussion is coming soon. For now, capture context in the description and attach evidence from sources.

notFound.title: Task not found
notFound.description: This task doesn't exist or you don't have access to it.

commitments.noOrg: Select an organization to view commitments

empty.title: No commitments found
empty.description: Commitments are automatically extracted from your emails

followUp.subject: Follow-up: {{title}}
followUp.body:
Hi{{name}},

I wanted to follow up regarding: {{title}}.

Could you please provide an update on the status?

Best regards

toasts.followUpGeneratedDescription: Copy it from the task detail panel.

decisions.noOrg: Select an organization to view decisions

empty.title: No decisions found
empty.description: Decisions are automatically extracted from your emails

dialog.title: Decision evolution
dialog.description: See how this decision has evolved over time

contacts.selectOrg: Select an organization to view contacts

empty.description: Contacts are automatically extracted from your emails

schedule.title: Timeline of commitments and agent runs
schedule.description: Align obligations with automated missions so nothing slips past the horizon.
schedule.selectOrg: Select an organization to view schedules

commitments.title: Commitment timeline
commitments.description: Due dates and urgency across the week ahead.

continuums.title: Agent cadence
continuums.note: Align scheduled runs with mission-critical work for tighter accountability.

trust.title: Evidence first. Confidence always.
trust.description: Every decision is grounded in verified evidence, with audit trails you can prove in seconds.
trust.selectOrg: Select an organization to view trust signals

indicators.title: Trust Indicators
indicators.description: Evidence-backed confidence on the most critical UIOs.

ledger.title: Audit Ledger
ledger.description: Cryptographic chain validation across every action.

continuums.selectOrg: Select an organization to view Agents
continuums.title: Orchestrate long-horizon intelligence
continuums.description: Agents are self-sustaining missions. Keep them active, preview next actions, and audit every run with confidence.

empty.title: No Agents yet
empty.description: Define your first mission in Agent Studio.

continuums.noDescription: No description yet — refine in Agent Studio.

ledger.pickPrompt: Pick a agent to inspect its run history and alerts.
ledger.empty: No runs yet. Trigger the first run from the list.

expectedActions.title: Expected Actions
expectedActions.empty: No actions projected in this horizon.

actuations.title: Actuations
actuations.description: Execute actions triggered by Continuums and audit outcomes, approvals, and rollbacks.
actuations.noOrg: Select an organization to execute actuations

newActuation.title: New actuation
newActuation.description: Queue a driver action with tiering, approvals, and an auditable payload.

builder.title: Agent Studio
builder.description: Draft Agents with intent, validate the definition, then publish to runtime.
builder.noOrg: Select an organization to build Agents

target.label: Target
target.hint: Only needed when updating an existing agent.

intent.title: Intent
intent.description: Describe what you want. The template will auto-populate the DSL skeleton.

intent.label: Intent
intent.placeholder: e.g. Track legal advice drift and escalate contradictions

definition.title: Definition
definition.description: Edit the DSL/JSON definition. Validate before publishing.
definition.readyDescription: Your definition looks valid. Publish to create a runtime version.

patterns.title: Patterns
patterns.description: Discover recurring clusters of commitments and decisions, then promote them into high-precision patterns.
patterns.noOrg: Select an organization to view patterns

active.title: Active patterns
active.description: Promoted patterns used to boost extraction and prioritization.

candidates.title: Candidates
candidates.description: Clusters discovered from memory. Promote the best ones.
candidates.empty: No candidates yet. Run discovery to find clusters.

dialog.title: Promote pattern
dialog.description: Give the pattern a name and domain. It will start affecting extraction immediately.

simulations.title: Simulations
simulations.description: Run what-if scenarios against commitments and risk posture.
simulations.noOrg: Select an organization to run simulations

controls.title: Controls
controls.description: Define the scenario and any overrides, then simulate risk impact.

latest.title: Latest result
latest.description: Most recent simulation output for this session.
latest.empty: Run a simulation to see results.

history.title: History
history.description: Recent simulation runs for this org.

ask.label: Ask
ask.hint: Evidence-first answers from your memory graph
ask.placeholder: Ask a question (e.g. “what changed this week?”)

find.label: Find
find.hint: Search UIOs, messages, documents, and agents

build.label: Build
build.hint: Create or edit agents and automation logic
build.placeholder: Search build surfaces or type a command…

act.label: Act
act.placeholder: Search execution surfaces or type a command…

inspect.label: Inspect
inspect.hint: Audit trust, evidence, and the graph
inspect.placeholder: Search inspection surfaces or type a command…

hints.signIn: Sign in to use the Intent Bar.

evidence.heading: Evidence
evidence.noEvidence: No evidence found. Drovi will not guess.
evidence.checkSources: Check ingestion status in Connected Sources

ask.hintIdle: Type a question and press Enter.

examples.risks: What commitments are at risk right now?
examples.changes: What changed in the last 24 hours?
examples.decisions: Show me decisions about the pilot rollout.
examples.unresolvedRisks: What are the unresolved risks for this week?

find.hintMinChars: Type at least 2 characters to search.

goConsole.title: Console
goConsole.description: Open the pilot health and KPIs console.

goSources.title: Connected Sources
goSources.description: View ingestion, backfills, and live sync status.

goTeam.title: Team
goTeam.description: Manage members, invites, and organization settings.

goBuilder.title: Agent Studio
goBuilder.description: Build and iterate on agent logic.

goSimulations.title: Simulations
goSimulations.description: Model what-if scenarios with evidence-backed inputs.

goReality.title: Reality Stream
goReality.description: See every change captured across your org.

goTrust.title: Trust & Audit
goTrust.description: Review confidence, drift, and contradiction signals.

copyLink.title: Copy page link
copyLink.description: Copy a shareable link to the current page.

copyUioId.title: Copy UIO ID
copyUioId.description: Copy the current Unified Intelligence Object ID.

goAgentRuns.title: Agent Runs
goAgentRuns.description: Inspect run traces, receipts, and runtime diagnostics.

goAgentInbox.title: Agent Inbox
goAgentInbox.description: Manage channel threads, approvals, and direct commands.

timeline.confidenceTooltip: AI confidence score for this detection.

login.title: Sign in
login.description: Use your `@drovi.co` email and the current admin password.
login.keepSignedIn: Keep me signed in on this device
login.troubleshoot: If you can’t sign in, set `ADMIN_PASSWORD` in `drovi-intelligence/.env` and restart the stack.

notes.kpisRefresh: KPIs update every 5 seconds. TV mode uses fullscreen for wall displays.
notes.opsControls: For deeper operational controls, use the Jobs and Connectors pages.

connectors.title: Connectors
connectors.description: Configuration status and capabilities. Refreshes every 15s.

exchange.title: Exchange Moderation
